short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a timer next to WIRIS questions in Moodle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The WIRIS Timer extension is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your experience when using WIRIS-based questions on platforms like Moodle. It automatically tracks and saves the time you spend on each question, ensuring your progress is preserved even after refreshing the page or closing your browser tab. With and seamless integration, it makes online learning more efficient and stress-free for students, it can allow them to practice questions with a given recommanded time, and to manage time more effectively. Say goodbye to useless training and enjoy a smoother learning experience with WIRIS Timer.
